Flow Measurement Instrumentation Standards
Introduction
Accurate flow measurement underpins material balance, control and custody transfer in a refinery. The following standards integrate guidance from API 551 and ISO 5167 and synthesise detailed requirements for magnetic, propeller and differential pressure flowmeters from industry specifications【51948133245220†L2055-L2194】.
Applicable Standards
API 551 – Process Measurement Instrumentation: flow measurement instruments.
ISO 5167 – Measurement of Fluid Flow by Means of Differential Pressure Devices.
ASME MFC‑3M / AGA 9 – Mass Flowmeter Standards.
ISA 5.1 and ISA 20 for symbols and data sheets.
MIL‑STD‑45662A: calibration system requirements.
Equipment Types
Magnetic flowmeters: low‑frequency electromagnetic meters producing 4–20 mA output; include metering tube, signal cable, transmitter and grounding rings【51948133245220†L2055-L2097】.
Propeller and turbine flowmeters: used for water and low‑viscosity services; accuracy ±2 % of rate【5
